.. _create_giotto_points_object:
``create_giotto_points_object``
===================================

Create giotto points object

Description
-----------

Create giotto points object

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   create_giotto_points_object(
     feat_type = "rna",
     spatVector = NULL,
     networks = NULL
   )

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``feat_type``
     - feature type
   * - ``spatVector``
     - terra spatVector object containing point data
   * - ``networks``
     - feature network object
